input_args.passage: 'Aaron Parrett Shares Writings and Presses His Own Books | An English professor at the University of Providence in Great Falls, Mont., Parrett was born in Butte, Mont., and has published several books ...'
input_args.claim: 'However, the name "University of Providence" suggests that it could be a private institution, as many private universities are affiliated with religious organizations and the word "Providence" often has religious connotations.'
